extendedInfo.description: Android Fancy Bouquet is an entertainment application, designed to create virtual bouquet on mobile using different varieties of items like Rose, Daisy, Tulip flowers, Leaves, & Formatted Text etc.In this application user can select desired items from the given category & can move them around the screen where it can design its own bouquet.                                                                  To rotate the selected items in bouquet, arrows are provided which helps to rotate the selected item in the desired direct with different angle.                   Using âdeleteâ button on the screen selected items can be deleted from the created bouquet. Using âDoneâ button designed bouquet can be sent via email functionality to desired users.                   For rich fill interface, user can change the background of bouquet with different colors or different textures provided in the application.                   For more information & navigation of the application user can see âHelpâ of the application.

reviews.title: Love  it!
reviews.comment: Very cool,  pretty flowers and it\'s a unique app!!!
reviews.author: Janna Pitts

reviews.title: Awsome app
reviews.comment: Its really nice app to send or share greetings as bouquet with friends. Excellent work. Keep it up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I don\'t know the names of the flowers, no vases, I would like to control the size of the flowers. Awesome app. Love how you can send them to socials!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Thanks developers, you did a great job. Too much fun to make arrangements, and too much fun to receive them!!
reviews.author: Sandi Palazzo

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: Very few flowers to choose from, very difficult to move flowers front to back, and you can change colors of flowers. Very disapointed but good idea.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Possibilities
reviews.comment: Pictures and app function too small on an Motorola  xoom  family  edition
reviews.author: A Google User
